name: Cosmic Casino Dash
description:
Come along with Ace, our nifty robot space cowboy, as he dashes through a casino in search of the motorbike he crash-landed with! However, beware, for the casino will choose to take pieces of your path away each time the slot machine rolls. 

This game can be played with a game controller or a keyboard. For maximum fun, try getting to the end using different routes! 

Enjoy!

Controls:

Game Controller:

  • Move: Gamepad
  • Jump: X button
  • Run: Square Button
  • Shoot Lasso Diagonally: Left/Right Bumper
  • Shoot Lasso Up: Left Bumper
  • Shoot Lasso Up/Horizontal: Right Bumper
  • Pause: Right Options Button

Keyboard:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Run: Left Shift
  • Shoot Lasso Diagonally: C
  • Shoot Lasso Up/Horizontally: V
  • Pause: P

Credits:

  • David Martinez- Programmer
  • Melissa Zhang- Programmer
  • Annie Wu- Artist
  • Jarod Perez- Music & SFX
  • Alexia Narro-Alvers- Designer and Assistant Artist
